tuv.seg: Housing Aid for Older People Scheme
An Scéim um Chúnamh Tithíochta do Dhaoine Breacaosta
The Housing Aid for Older People Scheme is used to improve the condition of an older person's home
Úsáidtear an Scéim um Chúnamh Tithíochta do Dhaoine Breacaosta chun teach seanduine a fheabhsú
In general, it is aimed at people 66 years of age and older, who are living in poor housing conditions. However, in cases of genuine hardship the local authority may assist people under age 66

Tá an scéim seo dírithe ar dhaoine atá 66 bliana d'aois nó os a chionn go ginearálta, ach mar sin féin, d'fhéadfadh an t-údarás áitiúil cúnamh a thabhairt do dhaoine faoi 66 bliana d'aois má tá fíor-chruatan i gceist

If you have a disability and your home needs to be adapted to make it more accessible, the Housing Adaptation Grant for People with a Disability or the Mobility Aids Grant Scheme may be more suitable for you

Más gá an teach a oiriúniú le haghaidh ball teaghlaigh atá faoi mhíchumas, d'fhéadfadh an Deontas Oiriúnaithe Tithe do Dhaoine faoi Mhíchumas nó an Scéim Deontas Áiseanna Soghluaisteachta a bheith níos oiriúnaí duit

These 3 schemes are administered by local authorities, under the Housing (Adaptation Grants for Older People and People with a Disability) Regulations 2007, which were amended by new Regulations in 2014
Riarann na h-údaráis áitiúla an 3 scéim seo faoi Rialacháin 2007, a leasaíodh ag Rialacháin 2014
VAT refunds are available on aids and appliances used by people with disabilities. This refund scheme also applies to the cost of installation work
Is féidir aisíocaíocht CBL a éileamh ar áiseanna agus trealamh atá in úsáid ag duine atá faoi mhíchumas agus ar an obair shuiteála freisin
Local authorities have been instructed that only essential repairs should be undertaken to make the property habitable for the applicant
Braitheann an cineál oibre a dtugtar cúnamh deontais dó ar rialacha an údaráis áitiúil
Local authorities vary as regards what type of work they will grant aid under the Housing Aid for Older People Scheme
Fiafraigh de d'údarás áitiúil féin cad iad na cineálacha oibre a chlúdaíonn sé
You should check with your own local authority to see which types of work its scheme will cover

Tá ordú tugtha d’údaráis áitiúla nach ceart ach deisiúcháin atá riachtanach a dhéanamh ar theach chun go bhféadfadh an t-iarratasóir cónaí ann; i gcás oibre eile ar nós fuinneoga, doirse nó córais théimh a athchuir, déanfar gach cás a mheas ar a shon féin
The type of work that is grant aided can include some or all of the following:
I measc na bhfeabhsúchán gur féidir a dhéanamh le cúnamh faoin Scéim, áirítear:
• Structural repairs or improvements
• Deisiúcháin nó feabhsúcháin struchtúrtha
• Repair or replacement of windows and doors
• Deisiúchán ar fhuinneoga agus doirse, nó fuinneoga agus doirse nua a chur isteach
• The provision of water, sanitary services and heating
• Soláthar uisce, seirbhísí sláintíochta agus teasa
• Any other repair or improvement work considered necessary
• Obair dheisithe nó feabhsaithe ar bith eile a mheastar a bheith riachtanach
Many older people may be eligible for the Housing Aid for Older People Scheme. However, priority will be given to people on the basis of financial need
D'fhéadfadh go leor daoine breacaosta a bheith incháilithe don Scéim, ach mar sin féin, tabharfar tosaíocht do dhaoine ar bhunús riachtanais airgeadais
The grant can be paid to people in:
Is féidir an deontas a íoc le daoine a bhfuil cónaí orthu sna cinéalacha tithíochta a leanas:
• Houses being purchased from a local authority under the Tenant Purchase Scheme
• Teach atá á cheannach ó údarás áitiúil faoin scéim cheannaigh ag tionóntaí
Your application will be prioritised based on medical need
Tabharfar tús áite do d'iarratas bunaithe ar riachtanas leighis
Highest priority will be given to people for whom alterations or adaptations would facilitate their discharge from hospital or the continuance of care in their own home

Tabharfar an tús áite is airde do dhaoine sa chás go bhféadfaí iad a scaoileadh abhaile ón ospidéal, nósa chás go bhféadfaidís leanúint de chúram ina dteach féin dá ndéanfaí athruithe nó oiriúnuithe ar an teach
When the local authority receives your application, it may request an occupational therapist's (OT) assessment
Nuair a fhaigheann an t-údarás áitiúil d'iarratas, is féidir go n-iarrfadh sé measúnú ó theiripeoir saothair (TS)

The local authority can arrange for this, or you can employ an OT yourself and recoup up to €200 of the cost from the local authority as part of the grant, subject to the maximum grant limit that applies in your case

Is féidir leis an údarás áitiúil measúnú TS a eagrú, ach is féidir leat féin TS a fhostú chun measúnú a dhéanamh, agus suas le €200 forchúiteamh a fháil mar chuid den deontas iomlán, suas go dtí an uasmhéid atá tú i dteideal a fháil
Your total household income is assessed to find out if you qualify for the grant and at what level of assistance
Déantar measúnú ar d'ioncam teaghlaigh iomlán chun a fháil amach an bhfuil tú incháilithe don deontas, agus má tá, ag cén leibhéal cabhrach
• The property owner's (or tenant's) and their spouse's or partner's annual gross income in the previous tax year
• Ollioncam bliantúil úinéara na réadmhaoine (an tionónta i gcás áitreabh príobháideach ar cíos) agus a chéile nó a pháirtí sa bhliain cíosa roimhe sin
• Income of any other adults living in the household - aged over 23 years (or over 18 and not in full-time education)
• Ioncam ata ag aon duine fásta eile atá mar bhall den teaghlach - os cionn 23 bliana d'aois (nó os cionn 18 mbliana muna bhfuil siad in oideachas lánaimseartha)
The following is not taken into account when calculating your household income:
Ní thógtar an méid seo a leanas san áireamh nuair atá ioncam do theaghlaigh á ríomh:
• €5,000 for each member of the household aged up to 18 years
• €5,000 do gach duine den teaghlach atá faoi 18 bliana d'aois
• €5,000 for each member of the household aged between 18 and 23 years and in full-time education or on a SOLAS apprenticeship
• €5,000 do gach duine den teaghlach atá idir 18 agus 23 bliana d'aois agus atá in oideachas lánaimseartha nó ar phrintíseacht SOLAS
• €5,000 where the person to whom the grant application relates is being cared for by a relative on a full-time basis
• €5,000 sa chás go bhfuil cúram lánaimseartha á chur ar fáil ag duine muinteartha don té a bhfuil an deontas á sholáthar dó
• Carer's Benefit and Carer's Allowance (if the carer's payment is made in respect of the person to whom the grant application relates)
• Sochar Cúramóra agus Liúntas Cúramóra (má tá íocaíocht an chúramóra á dhéanamh i leith an té a bhfuil an deontas á chur ar fáil dó)
When applying for the grant, you must provide:
An t-eolas a bhíonn ag teastáil: iarratasóir
• Details of your tax district and • A statement that, to the best of your knowledge, your tax affairs are in order
I gcás íocaíochtaí deontais ní mór do chonraitheoirí deimhniú imréitigh cánach a sholáthar

You must include a written itemised quotation from a contractor, indicating the cost of the work required. If the local authority considers that this quotation is unreasonable, it will ask you to get another one
Le haghaidh íocaíochtaí níos mó ná €650, ní mór duit na sonraí seo a leanas a chur ar fáil don údarás áitiúil maidir le gach conraitheoir:
Tax information required: contractor
• Uimhir C2/Uimhir imréitigh cánach
For all grant payments, contractors must provide confirmation of tax clearance
Seans go n-iarrfaí ar do chonraitheoir Deimhniú C2/Deimhniú Imréitigh Cánach bailí a thaispeáint nó údarás a thabhairt don údarás áitiúil a stádas imréitigh cánach a dheimhniú go leictreonach
The grant will not be paid if you start work before you get grant approval
Ní íocfar an deontas má thosaítear ar an obair sula ndéantar an deontas a fhaomhadh
However, it is expected that the work will start within 6 months of your grant approval
Beifear ag súil go gcuirfear tús leis an obair taobh istigh de 6 mhí tar éis duit faomhadh a fháil don deontas
If this does not happen, the local authority may allow a time extension
Muna thosaítear an obair taobh istigh de 6 mhí, d'fhéadfá breis ama a éileamh ón údarás áitiúil
Getting the work done safely
Obair shábháilte a chinntiú
Under the Regulations governing safety, health and welfare at work, homeowners are obliged to ensure that construction work on their home is carried out by competent people
Faoi na Rialacháin a dhéanann rialú ar chúrsaí slándála, sláinte agus leasa san áit oibre, ní mór d’úinéirí tí a chinntiú gur daoine inniúil a dhéanann obair thógála ar bith a dhéantar ar a dteach
Read more, including a guide for homeowners (pdf) and some Frequently Asked Questions, on the website of the Health and Safety Authority
Tá tuilleadh le léamh faoi seo ar láithreán gréasáin an Údaráis Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta, mar shampla an Treoirleabhar le haghaidh Úinéirí Tí (pdf) agus roinnt Ceisteanna Coitianta freisin
Payment of a second grant
An dara deontas a íoc
It is possible to get a grant under the Housing Aid for Older People Scheme a second time if your needs have substantially changed over time
Is féidir deontas a fháil faoin Scéim um Chúnamh Tithíochta do Dhaoine Breacaosta don dara huair má thagann athrú mór ar do chuid riachtanais de réir a chéile
The maximum grant available under the Housing Aid for Older People Scheme is €8,000, which may cover 95% of the approved cost of works
Is é an uasdheontas atá ar fáil faoin Scéim um Chúnamh Tithíochta do Dhaoine Breacaosta ná €8,000, agus is féidir leis seo 95% de chostas na hoibre a chlúdach

This maximum grant of 95% is available to people with annual household incomes of less than €30,000, tapering to 30% for those with annual household incomes of €50,001 to €60,000. The following table shows the current rates

Tá 95% de chostas faofa na n-oibreacha ar fáil dóibh siúd le hioncam bliantúil teaghlaigh níos lú ná €30,000 agus é sin laghdaithe go dtí 30% dóibh siúd le hioncam bliantúil teaghlaigh idir €50,001 agus €60,000
Note: The maximum amounts may not be fully awarded
Nóta: Seans nach níocfar uasmhéid an deontais
Grant amounts are subject to the funding of each local authority so the local authority can decide whether they pay the full grant or a percentage in each case
Braitheann méid an deontais ar an méid chistiúcháin atá ag an údarás áitiúil – is féidir leis an údarás áitiúil cinneadh an íocfaidh sé an deontas iomlán nó céatadán den iomlán i ngach cás

Download an application form from your local authority’s website or ask for one to be posted to you
Is féidir foirm iarratais a íoslódáil ó láithreán gréasáin d'údaráis áitiúil nó iarraidh orthu foirm a sheoladh chugat
The form contains detailed information on the scheme’s conditions and a checklist of documents that you must include
Tá mioneolas ar an bhfoirm faoi choinniollacha na scéime, chomh maith le seicliosta na ndoiciméad atá le cur leis an bhfoirm
If you are unhappy with the local authority’s decision in your case, you can appeal the decision
Muna bhfuil tú sásta le cinneadh an údaráis áitiúil, is féidir achomharc a dhéanamh
The appeal must be in writing and must be made within 3 weeks of the decision
Caithfidh d'achomharc a bheith i scríbhinn agus caithfidh tú e a dhéanamh i 3 seachtaine
You must state the reasons and grounds for your appeal
Scríobh síos cad iad na fáthanna leis an achomharc a dhéanamh
Contact the Housing Section of your local authority for information about the eligibility rules in your area, which may differ from those in other local authority areas
Faigh breis eolais ó d'údarás áitiúil
